# SETUP
## Load libraries
```{r}
library(magrittr)
library(CSCpromoters)
library(ggplot2)
library(gggenes)
```


# LOAD DATA
```{r}
promoter_sizes
```

```{r}
annotations
```


# PLOT
```{r}
promoter_sizes %>%
  get_plotdata_locus(annotations)
```

```{r}
promoter_sizes %>%
  get_plotdata_locus(annotations) %>%
  get_plotdata_promoter()
```

```{r}
promoter_sizes %>%
  plot_promoter_maps(annotations)
```
